Frequently Asked Questions
==========================

What if I don't want or can't use. from Galaxy, the Track Hub direct link?

You can download the output of HubArchiveCreator tool, from Galaxy. It will give you an archive that you unzip and put somewhere accessible
for UCSC Track Hub.
